programme.title: Dungeons & Dragons
programme.desc: The call for equality by Empress Savina doesn't go down well with wicked wizard Profion, who sets into action an evil plan to keep power concentrated in the hands of the ruling Mages. For that, he needs the magical sceptre which controls the kingdom's dragons..(n)

programme.title: Corky Romano
programme.desc: Saturday Night Live cast member Chris Kattan stars in this mob comedy as Corky Romano, a veterinarian with a penchant for pop music from the '80s. As a youth, Corky was kicked out of his Mafia-connected family for being an oddball. Now his long-lost father (Peter Falk) has been indicted and needs Corky to infiltrate the FBI and steal the government's evidence against him. Corky is willing to aid the relatives who so long ago turned their backs on him, but his brothers go overboard when intimidating the computer hacker who gets Corky's bogus application into the FBI academy, presenting him as a super agent named Pissant. Now Corky must live up to his reputation for an eminently qualified top cop while simultaneously trying to get the goods on his dad. Corky Romano co-stars Peter Berg, Chris Penn, Vincent Pastore, Vinessa Shaw, Fred Ward, and Richard Roundtree(n)

programme.title: Gawayn
programme.desc: Smooch or Not to Smooch. The Questers are lured to a murky swamp, where a singing frog turns Gwen into a toad, and her only recourse is to kiss Roddy to break the spell(n)

programme.title: Savage Family Wild
programme.desc: The Pangolin Smugglers. Two poachers surprise The Green Squad while they observe a pangolin and her baby(n)

programme.title: Dad
programme.desc: Funny and moving tale of an elderly father and his adult son who rediscover each other - and themselves - when brought together by a family crisis. When Bettie, the wife of 75-year-old Jake Tremont, is hospitalized, his long-absent son John moves in and looks after him(n)

programme.title: Dance with Me
programme.desc: A young Cuban refugee finds himself in the sizzling center of Latino dance clubs after making his way to America to find the father he never knew---a burned-out ballroom dance instructor. Vanessa L. Williams, Chayanne, Kris Kristofferson, Jane Krakowski, Joan Plowright, Harry Groener, Beth Grant, William Marquez, Rick Valenzuela, Scott Paetty(n)

programme.title: The Three Investigators and the Secret of Terror Castle
programme.desc: After viewing a mysterious video tape, three young detectives are lead to an abandoned house that appears to be haunted. Investigating the dilapidated building, the trio discover all is not as it seems as they cross paths with a ruthless adversary(n)

programme.title: Fairy Tale: A True Story
programme.desc: In this fantastic fact-based tale, two British girls claim to have danced with fairies...and have the photos to prove it. Soon, everyone, including Sir Arthur Conan Doyle (Peter O' Toole) and Harry Houdini (Harvey Keitel), comes to believe them, and the world's faith in miracles and magic is restored. Florence Hoath, Elizabeth Earl, Paul McGann, Phoebe Nicholls. Charles Sturridge directed(n)

programme.title: The Rugrats Movie
programme.desc: Based on the TV series, this animated feature film stars the feisty kids, who decide Dil, the latest addition to the family, is too troublesome and needs taking to the hospital to be fixed. But they get lost in the woods and find themselves in danger... Fun for the kids but with a layer of sophisticated humour adults will enjoy, the film features the voices of Busta Rhymes, Iggy Pop, Tim Curry and Whoopi Goldberg(n)

programme.title: All Dogs Go to Heaven 2
programme.desc: A German shepherd returns to Earth from Heaven to recover an angel's horn, but instead finds love(n)

programme.title: Catch That Kid
programme.desc: Comedy and action blend in this entertaining caper, a family-friendly alternative to "Ocean's Eleven." A carefree 12-year-old (Kristen Stewart) plans a bank heist to finance an operation to repair her paralyzed father's spine. She puts her plan in motion with the help of two friends---a computer geek (Corbin Bleu) and a mechanical wiz (Max Thieriot). Jennifer Beals(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted--or rather, refereed--by boxing expert Max Kellerman, this lively cable-TV discussion show featured four sports columnists, each from a different part of the USA, discussing recent pro-athletic developments in a sort of electronic summit meeting. Kellerman determined how much time each of the columnists would be permitted to express his or her opinions--and he was harsh indeed, frequently limiting the discourse to ten seconds or less. At the end of the show, Kellerman would award points for the most cogent opinions and arguments, and also subtract points from contributors whom he determined had not effectively expressed themselves. The inagural episode of ESPN's Around the Horn was seen on September 30, 2002(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Brian and The Boz. Thaddeus D. Matula's documentary Brian and The Boz profiles Brian Bosworth, who became one of the greatest defensive players in the history of college football during his career at Oklahoma University. He was a brash personality, but his behavior and his ego led to trouble during his professional career where he flamed out after only a few seasons. This film features Bosworth looking back on his past, and was produced as part of ESPN's 30 for 30 series of non-fiction sports films(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: The Gospel According to Mac. Polarizing football coach Bill McCartney and his revitalization of the Colorado Buffaloes is chronicled, examining off-the-field lows as well as the high of a 1990 national title. McCartney was founder of the Promise Keepers, a Christian men's ministry. Directed by Jim Podhoretz(n)

programme.title: On the Record With Greta Van Susteren
programme.desc: As part of the ongoing ratings war between rival cable services CNN and The Fox News Network, CNN commentator Greta Van Susteren was wooed to the "other network" with promises of a much larger salary and a nightly interview program of her own. That program, On the Record With Greta Van Susteren, debuted on February 4, 2002. While some observers were mildly surprised that Van Susteren, whose politics tended to be left of center, would agree to star on a cable network with a perceived Conservative slant, most of the press attention concerning the new series was focused on Van Susteren's remarkable cosmetic-surgery makeover, which she insisted had been decided upon long before Fox News Network offered her a job. On the Record With Greta Van Susteren was seen on a Monday through Friday basis from 10:00 to 11:00 p.m. EST(n)
